parameters.name: SourceDoc
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the document to copy

parameters.name: DestDoc
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the document to which to copy SourceDoc

parameters.name: ChildCount
parameters.description: Number of child documents for SourceDoc

parameters.name: FromChildren
parameters.description: Array containing the full path and filenames of the child documents dependent on the document specified for SourceDoc

parameters.name: ToChildren
parameters.description: Array of strings containing the new full path and filenames of the child documents to which to copy the child documents specified for FromChildren

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Copy options as defined by swMoveCopyOptions_e

title: ISldWorks.ICopyDocument
description: Copies a document and optionally updates references to it.
signature:
System.Int32 ICopyDocument( 
   System.String
SourceDoc
,
   System.String
DestDoc
,
   System.Int32
ChildCount
,
   ref System.String
FromChildren
,
   ref System.String
ToChildren
,
   System.Int32
Option
)

parameters.name: SourceDoc
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the document to copy

parameters.name: DestDoc
parameters.description: Full path and filename of the document to which to copy SourceDoc

parameters.name: ChildCount
parameters.description: Number of child documents for SourceDoc

parameters.name: FromChildren
parameters.description: Array containing the full path and filenames of the child documents dependent on the document specified for SourceDoc

parameters.name: ToChildren
parameters.description: Array of strings containing the new full path and filenames of the child documents to which to copy the child documents specified for FromChildren

parameters.name: Option
parameters.description: Copy options as defined by swMoveCopyOptions_e

returns: Success or error code as defined by swMoveCopyError_e
remarks: There can be no documents open when using this method.
